index.site_subtitle: Platform of jobs for Bitcoin users

banner.text: Explore the Bitcoin universe and help stimulate the decentralized economy. Hire using digital coins.

about.title: About Us
about.text: We are a startup that offers modernity in the area of ad jobs. Our goal is to promote the use of Bitcoin in the global job market.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.text: We are under construction, accompany the development of the project on Github.

team.title: The Team
team.text: We formed a decentralized team of maintainers with great skills.

support.title: Support the Project
support.text: Liked BitVagas? Help us strengthen the project with your donation.
